name: Meemaw's CookNook
description:
You're a newly wed who just married the love of your life. However, you need to keep your husband well fed to keep him happy.

Lucky for you, the internet is full of recipes. The best being ones from Meemaw.

Learn new foods, find out how you met your husband, and unlock all the secrets in Meemaw's CookNook!

(Secrets can be unlocked throughout the game. Some Youtuber easter eggs included. HINT: Name the password
